name: Set
description: Set, god of storm and chaos, rules over gale, desert and destruction, yet is also seen as a guardian of light and order.

skills.name: Frenzied Sand Whirl
skills.description: Set swings his spear, dealing DMG to targets in front of him while dashing forward. He repeats this move three times. The first two strikes deal DMG equal to 100% of ATK and slightly knock back enemies. The third strike deals DMG equal to 320% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases the third attack's bonus to 350% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: The third attack is guaranteed to hit.
upgrades.level4: Increases the third attack's bonus to 380% of ATK.

skills.name: Sand Burial
skills.description: Set swings his weapon, dealing DMG equal to 240% of ATK to nearby enemies.

upgrades.level2: Reduces hit targets’ Armor by 15% for 5s.
upgrades.level3: Increases the DMG bonus to 270% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Reduces hit targets’ Armor by 30% for 5s.

skills.name: Dunes’ Bloodrage
skills.description: Grants all allies on the battlefield 15% Lifesteal.

upgrades.level4: Allies around Set gain an additional 15% Lifesteal.

skills.name: Khamsin’s Shelter
skills.description: Set leaps behind the most vulnerable ally, granting himself and that ally a shield equal to 240% of ATK for 8s.

upgrades.level2: Increases the shield bonus to 270% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Set and that ally gain 30% ATK SPD for 8s.
upgrades.level4: Increases the shield bonus to 300% of ATK.

relic.name: Dance of the Sands
relic.description: Each Sand Burial cast increases the DMG of the next Sand Burial by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

upgrades.level2: The effect of Dunes’ Bloodrage remains active after Set falls.
upgrades.level3: Each Normal Attack has a 30% chance to trigger Sand Burial. When HP drops to 50%/20%, the trigger chance is increased to 50%/100%.
upgrades.level4: Each Sand Burial cast increases the DMG of the next Sand Burial by 20%, stacking up to 5 times.
